009package PointOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramMatcher;
015import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramPlot;
016import imagingbook.common.histogram.Util;
017
018/**
019 * Adapts image intensities to match a Gaussian histogram.
020 * 
021 * @author WB
022 * 
023 * @see HistogramMatcher
024 * @see HistogramPlot
025 * @see Util#makeGaussianHistogram(double, double)
026 *
027 */
028public class Match_To_Gaussian_Histogram implements PlugInFilter {
029        
030        private static double GaussMean = 128;
031        private static double GaussVariance = 128;
032        
033        @Override
034        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
035                return DOES_8G;
036        }
037        
038        @Override
039        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
040                
041                // get histograms
042                int[] hi = ip.getHistogram();
043                int[] hG = Util.makeGaussianHistogram(GaussMean, GaussVariance);
044                                
045                (new HistogramPlot(hi, "Image Histogram")).show();
046                (new HistogramPlot(hG, "Gaussian Histogram")).show();
047                
048                double[] nhG = Util.normalizeHistogram(hG);
049                (new HistogramPlot(nhG, "Gaussian Hist. normalized")).show();
050                
051                double[] chG = Util.Cdf(hG);
052        (new HistogramPlot(chG, "Gaussian Hist. cumulative")).show();
053                
054                HistogramMatcher m = new HistogramMatcher();
055                int[] F = m.matchHistograms(hi, hG);
056                
057//              for (int i = 0; i < F.length; i++) {
058//                      IJ.log(i + " -> " + F[i]);
059//              }
060                
061                ip.applyTable(F);
062                int[] hAm = ip.getHistogram();
063                (new HistogramPlot(hAm, "Histogram A (mod)")).show();
064                (new HistogramPlot(Util.Cdf(hAm), "Cumulative Histogram A (mod)")).show();
065        }
066
067}
068
